pastries.name: Croissant
pastries.description: A classic French pastry known for its flaky layers and buttery taste.

pastries.name: Danish Pastry
pastries.description: A sweet and flaky pastry, often filled with fruit, cream cheese, or custard.

pastries.name: Cinnamon Roll
pastries.description: A sweet roll with a cinnamon and sugar filling, topped with icing or glaze.

pastries.name: Chocolate Croissant
pastries.description: A delightful twist on the classic croissant, filled with rich chocolate.

pastries.name: Blueberry Muffin
pastries.description: A moist and flavorful muffin studded with fresh blueberries.

pastries.name: Apple Turnover
pastries.description: A pastry filled with spiced apples, typically folded into a triangular shape.

pastries.name: Scone
pastries.description: A British favorite, a crumbly and tender pastry often flavored with fruits or nuts.

pastries.name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
pastries.description: A chewy bagel topped with a generous spread of cream cheese.

pastries.name: Almond Croissant
pastries.description: A variation of the classic croissant, filled and topped with almond paste and sliced almonds.

pastries.name: Raspberry Danish
pastries.description: A sweet and tangy pastry, filled with raspberry jam and cream cheese.

pastries.name: Pecan Sticky Bun
pastries.description: A gooey and indulgent pastry with pecans, caramel, and cinnamon.

pastries.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
pastries.description: A classic cookie loaded with chocolate chips for a sweet treat.

pastries.name: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffin
pastries.description: A light and citrusy muffin with the added crunch of poppy seeds.

pastries.name: Cheese Danish
pastries.description: A delightful pastry filled with sweetened cream cheese and sometimes fruit.

pastries.name: Pain au Chocolat
pastries.description: A French pastry similar to a chocolate croissant, filled with chocolate batons.
